DataElement.preferredName: Chromosome Segment Segment Begin Genomic Feature Physical Location java.lang.Integer
DataElement.preferredDefinition: One of the bodies in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions.:One of the parts into which something naturally divides._One of the parts into which something naturally divides.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:The physical location on a specified chromosome of a feature or area of interest expressed as a base pair position._Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: One of the bodies in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions.:One of the parts into which something naturally divides.

Concepts.definition: A structure found in cells that is comprised of a strand of linearized double-stranded DNA plus proteins that package the DNA in a condensed coil form and regulate chromosomal function.
One of the parts into which something naturally divides.
